channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole on the junction to turn towards leckhampton, 9th January
item.description:
Pothole on the junction to turn towards leckhampton when heading northbound. Located on the LHS of the carriageway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Junction, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Road subsidence for approx 100yds, 9th January
item.description:
The road is subsiding in previous repair patches down Sydenham Road North. The damage is deep and sharp enough that cars bottom out when coming back up the other side of the patch. Please drive along the road around 20mph and feel the defects for yourself.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Carlton Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Block drainage, 8th January
item.description:
The road is permanently flooded along this stretch of the road. Obviously its worse now due to the recent rain but floods even after a shower.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Malden Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Street lights still not working. Reported in November… then December.. been over 2 months and still not getting fixed. Location is opposite my house and next to park, so extremely dark., 8th January
item.description:
Opposite 9 Sunrise Avenue. It’s been over 2 months since I reported this issue, and more like 3 months since it stopped working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Sunrise Avenue, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road edge full of 2 years of leaves and litter, 8th January
item.description:
The entire road is full of at least 2 years of fallen leaves, branches, litter, traffic cones, the back of an old TV and more. It's getting harder to see the kerb edge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gardners Lane, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree on pavement not dealt with safely - wheelchair user & prams difficulty passing right next to pedestrian crossing, 8th January
item.description:
Looks like the problem has been half dealt with - tree fallen across pavement-pub sign & tree totally across pavement now half a tree left!!!! Green space opposite Woodlands Vet clinic GL3 4LS at end of Green St/ Ermin st right next to pedestrian crossing & close to bus stop! Since bad weather - problem been for 2 weeks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pile of leaves by council owned garage block needs collecting and disposing, 8th January
item.description:
There is a large pile of leaves at a Cheltenham Borough Council owned garage block (site 891) that needs to be collected. The garage block is situated behind the block of flats on Haywards Road (GL52 6RQ) and in the past the council has arranged for the leaves to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
